p1.text: In html we have three types of list: Ordered, Unordered and Definition lists. Unordered lists are made using the ul tag and each item in the list are made using the li tag

p2.text: Ordered lists are similar to unordered lists except they are made using the ol in place of ul

p3.text: The major differnce between an ordered list and an unordered list is that while ordered list use numbers to identify list items, unordered list do not

p4.text: Definition lists are entirely different from oredered and unordered list because it doesn't use list items. Instead with definition lists we have the term (<dt>) and the definition (<dd>). Definition lists are very rarely used unlike ordered and unordered list
